When you say "reason over" the sum, what do you mean? I think you have the right case. You should induct like this:

import Mathlib

variable {R : Type*} {M : Type*}
variable [Ring R] [AddCommGroup M] [Module R M]


lemma foo {y z : M} {p : Submodule R M} {p' : Submodule R M}
 (ymem: y âˆˆ p) (zmem: z âˆˆ p')  (h': Disjoint p p'):
  y + z = 0 â†” y = 0 âˆ§ z = 0 := by
  constructor
  . intro h''
    rw [add_eq_zero_iff_neg_eq] at h''
    constructor
    . have := (Submodule.disjoint_def.mp h') _ (Submodule.neg_mem p ymem) (by rwa [h''])
      exact neg_eq_zero.mp this
    . rw [neg_eq_iff_eq_neg] at h''
      have := (Submodule.disjoint_def.mp h'.symm) _ (Submodule.neg_mem p' zmem) (by rwa [â† h''])
      exact neg_eq_zero.mp this
  . rintro âŸ¨rfl, rflâŸ©; simp only [add_zero]


open BigOperators

lemma Submodule.sum_eq_iSup (s : Finset Î¹) (f : Î¹ â†’ Submodule R M) :
    âˆ‘ i âˆˆ s, f i = â¨† i âˆˆ s, f i := by
  induction s using Finset.cons_induction_on with
  | hâ‚ => simp
  | hâ‚‚ ha IH =>
    simp only [Finset.sum_cons, add_eq_sup, IH, Finset.mem_cons, iSup_or, iSup_sup_eq]
    congr
    simp

lemma Submodule.mem_sum_of_mem {s : Finset Î¹} {f : Î¹ â†’ Submodule R M} (x : M) (hi : âˆƒ i âˆˆ s, x âˆˆ f i) :
    x âˆˆ âˆ‘ i âˆˆ s, f i := by
  rw [sum_eq_iSup, mem_iSup]
  intro N hN
  obtain âŸ¨i, hi, hxâŸ© := hi
  exact hN i (mem_iSup_of_mem hi hx)

lemma Submodule.sum_mem_sum_of_forall_mem (s : Finset Î¹) {f : Î¹ â†’ Submodule R M} {g : Î¹ â†’ M} (h : âˆ€ i âˆˆ s, g i âˆˆ f i):
    âˆ‘ i âˆˆ s, g i âˆˆ âˆ‘ i âˆˆ s, f i := by
  rw [sum_eq_iSup, mem_iSup]
  intro N hN
  exact sum_mem fun i hi => hN i (mem_iSup_of_mem hi (h i hi))


lemma bar (s : Finset Î¹) {ys : Î¹ â†’ M} {Vs : Î¹ â†’ Submodule R M}
    (mem : âˆ€ i âˆˆ s, ys i âˆˆ Vs i) (h': Pairwise (Disjoint on Vs)) :
    âˆ‘ i âˆˆ s, ys i = 0 â†” âˆ€ i âˆˆ s, ys i = 0 := by
  induction s using Finset.cons_induction_on with
  | hâ‚ => simp
  | hâ‚‚ ha IH =>
    specialize IH (fun i hi => mem i (by simp [hi]))
    simp only [Finset.sum_cons, Finset.mem_cons, forall_eq_or_imp, â† IH]
    rename_i a s

    Â· infer_instance
    Â· exact (Vs a)
    Â· exact (âˆ‘ i âˆˆ s, Vs i) -- failed to synthesize instance AddCommMonoid (Submodule R M)
    Â· exact (mem a (by simp))
    Â· refine Submodule.sum_mem_sum_of_forall_mem (f := Vs) ?_ ?_
      intro i hi
